channel.title: ͡|̲̲̲͡͡͡ ̲▫̲͡ ̲̲̲͡͡π̲̲͡͡ ̲̲͡▫̲̲͡͡ ̲|Knock on my door and Help ME!
channel.description:
[center]Hello, I'm new to this forum and I have a few questions.
#1How do I make it to where it gives me the item on Moparscape instead of it saying "cmon type it right!! Again!" when I am typing it right.. this is right correct? ::pickup 0995 2147000000 P.s. it happens to every command..
#2How can i make my letters different colors on the server status page. [/center]
PLEASE WITH AN ANSWER TO THIS POST!!!!

item.title: ͡|̲̲̲͡͡͡ ̲▫̲͡ ̲̲̲͡͡π̲̲͡͡ ̲̲͡▫̲̲͡͡ ̲|Knock on my door and Help ME!
item.dc:creator: @Unid_H4x0r Unid H4x0r
item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

::pickup 0995 2147000000 - Wrong
::pickup 0995 214700000 - RIGHT (Cant be greater then 9 #'s)

Read full topic
